meanings.definition: A building or place equipped for observing the stars and planets.
meanings.sent1: We visited the planetaria to learn about the stars and planets.
meanings.sent2: The planetaria in our town has a telescope for stargazing.
meanings.sent3: The planetaria was so dark inside, I almost bumped into a model of Saturn!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a planetaria of knowledge, with stars of wisdom shining bright.
meanings.sent5: The planetaria's dome ceiling made me feel like I was under the night sky.

meanings.sent1: The planetaria projected a beautiful image of the Milky Way.
meanings.sent2: We watched a documentary with the help of the planetaria in the classroom.
